product.longDescription: Slow bolting and tolerant to tipburn, Rex performs extremely well for spring and summer greenhouse production. Not recommended for outdoor production. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 17, 18, 22, 24, 25, 29, 30, 33–35, 37; US 5–9. MT0-30. Only available pelleted. Avg. 660 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: The standard for hydroponic growing. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

  • Product Notes: <span style="" >Many (though not all) of our pelleted lettuce varieties are primed to increase germination uniformity, and to break thermal and/or light dormancy. However, the priming process decreases the storage life of the seed, so pelleted seed must be kept cool and dry prior to planting, and should be used within one year of purchase.</span>
